Class Tetronimo

  • java.lang.Object
    • wheelsunh.etc.AbstractGraphic
      • wheelsunh.users.AbstractShape
        • wheelsunh.users.ShapeGroup
          • models.Tetronimo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.util.EventListener, wheelsunh.etc.CustomGraphic, wheelsunh.Locatable, wheelsunh.Rotatable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StraightLine

    public abstract class Tetronimo
extends wheelsunh.users.ShapeGroup
    Tetronimo.java: An abstract class to model the base capaabilities of a tetronimo
    Version:
    1.0 July 24, 2020
    Author:
    Professor Rossi
    See Also:
    Color

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int SIZE
      Constant to represent the size of the tetronimo

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tetronimo()
      Generates the four rectangles for the tetronino and puts them on the screen, they are at the default coordinates to start

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void rotate()
      Increments the rotation of the tetronimo, other classes need to override this to provide the full functionality
      void shiftLeft()
      Shifts the tetronimo left one row
      void shiftRight()
      Shifts the tetronimo right one row
